channel.title: Alabama Vikings on
channel.description: Recent content in Alabama Vikings on

item.title: What to expect
item.description: We will be a small group of likeminded people wanting to learn more about preparedness etc. The talk will be about an hour with Q&A.

item.title: When do we meet?
item.description: January 21st 2023 - Why have a mutual assistance group (MAG)? December 3rd 2022 - Cyber Security, Safety, & Privacy

item.title: Why do we meet?
item.description: Grow relationships with local people to encourage each other in preparing for likely scenarios. Help people connect to start mutual assistance groups.

item.title: Why have a mutual assistance group (MAG)?
item.description: Nuclear attack Starvation Economic collapse Natural Disaster
